text:
AWT renderer won't render the contents of the fo:flow element. Contents of the fo:static-content element is rendered as expected. 

This bug is present in 1.1rc1 as well as for nightly build d.d. 20120927.

BTW Keep up the good work, your efforts are much appreciated ;)
creator: apache@hummeling.com

text: I have had a quick look into why the -awt is no longer rendering and have traced it back to a commit rrelating to Bugzilla 49754. This can be found here: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=revision&revision=1311120. Unfortunately, I am not able to look at it further at the moment due to other priorities, but the above should narrow it down in case anyone else wants to take a look in the meantime. Should noone else do so, I will probably be able to take a closer look next week.
creator: rmeyer@hotmail.co.uk

text:
Created attachment 29465
Patch to fix awt viewer not displaying documents correctly.

The problem was related to missing spans in the mainReference of the cloned BodyRegion object. This is now being copied manually and it seems to be working fine.
creator: rmeyer@hotmail.co.uk
lmpmbernardo@gmail.com
text: *** Bug 54212 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
